message.heading: If you put your mind to it, you can accomplish anything.

message.heading: Biff. What a character. Always trying to get away with something. I've had to stay on top of Biff ever since high school. Although, if it wasn't for him...

message.heading: Calvin? Wh... Why do you keep calling me Calvin?
